entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 5:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 17.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: 11.3°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 11.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
